title: Massage worker charged with assaulting multiple clients | 7NEWS
description: A 61-year-old massage parlour worker has been charged with sexually assaulting multiple clients at businesses located in shopping centres on the Gold Coast and in Brisbane. The alleged incidents involve a 17-year-old girl at a Southport location in December and a 29-year-old woman at Chermside in August. Police believe there may be additional victims and are urging witnesses to come forward, with the accused scheduled to appear in court in February. title: Ancient history exam blunder sees students taught wrong Roman ruler | 7NEWS
description: An investigation reveals that 140 ancient history students across nine Queensland schools were incorrectly taught about Augustus instead of Julius Caesar for their final exams due to poor communication from the curriculum authority. The education blunder resulted in the sacking of two QCAA board members, including teachers union boss Cresta Richardson. The revelation coincided with Queensland Year 12 students receiving their university offers, with over 16,000 students accepting places through QTAC. title: A New Jersey police officer was deemed a 'hero' after entering the frigid waters of Lake Mohawk
description: New Jersey police officer, Michael Poon, was deemed a 'hero' after entering the frigid waters of Lake Mohawk to rescue a dog stuck in the frozen lake. #rescue #lake #winter #frozenlake #animal

title: Moment firework lands on field before NFL game
description: A rogue firework has crashed onto the field before a Ravens and Patriots NFL game at the M&T Bank Stadium in Baltimore, Maryland. A Baltimore Ravens spokesperson told the Daily Mail that no one was injured and the incident was under investigation to determine what caused it. #firework #NFL #Baltimore #sport

title: Diver pinned by great white shark off Ocean Reef | 7NEWS
description: A diver was pinned to the ocean floor by a great white shark off Ocean Reef, with the shark circling him for approximately 10 minutes while his oxygen depleted. Tanvir Dillon wedged himself in a ledge to hide from the predator before eventually signalling his dive mates and making it safely back to the boat. Despite the terrifying encounter, the experienced diver emphasises the importance of staying calm during such crises and respects that divers are visitors in the shark's territory. title: Third batch of Epstein files released, Donald Trump mentioned
description: The US Justice Department has released a third batch of documents related to Jeffrey Epstein amid growing concerns from politicians and survivors that the department had fallen short of releasing all of its records as required by law.  The Department of Justice said Tuesday that it was releasing nearly 30,000 more pages of documents, including some that mentioned President Donald Trump. #files #DonaldTrump #DOJ #politics

title: Cause of Queensland ancient history subject blunder revealed
description: Systematic errors led to students studying the wrong ancient history topic for major exam, an independent review has revealed. The review was sparked after about 140 students at nine Queensland schools were taught about Augustus, the first Roman emperor, when they should have been learning about military and political leader Julius Caesar for their major exam this year.   â€œThe investigation found that multiple unintended factors, including staffing transitions, unexpected absences and challenging handovers, and knowledge continuity systems and processes - or lack thereof - occurred simultaneously but differently in different context,â€ the report said. #exam #ancienthistory #education #JuliusCaesar #Augutus

title: Over 100 abudcted Nigerian children and teachers released
description: The remaining130 kidnapped Nigerian schoolchildren and teachers have been released following one of the country's largest mass abductions in history. The children were among more than 300 pupils and 12 staff seized from St. Mary's Catholic School in Papiri, on November 21. #students #teachers #school #Nigeria

title: New gun and protest laws pass NSW parliament overnight
description: Landmark new gun and protest laws have passed New South Wales Parliament overnight following the fatal Bondi terror attack. The legislation is expected to be rubber stamped by the Lower House later today. #legislation #lawreform #parliament #auspol #NSW

title: Bondi attack victims honoured in New Year's Eve tribute | 7NEWS
description: Sydney's New Year's Eve celebrations will feature a tribute to Bondi Beach terror attack victims, with the Harbour Bridge illuminated in white at 9pm displaying a dove and the word 'peace'. A one-minute silence will be observed at 1pm to honour the victims and their families. Waverley Council has scheduled a meeting in January to determine plans for a permanent memorial at Archer Park, the attack site, with consultations involving the Premier's office, community members and victims' loved ones. title: Qantas flight makes emergency landing in Adelaide | 7NEWS
description: A Qantas flight from Singapore bound for Melbourne was forced to make an emergency landing in Adelaide after experiencing a cabin pressurisation malfunction. The aircraft circled off the coast multiple times before landing with low fuel at approximately 5am, leaving 246 passengers stranded at Adelaide Airport on Christmas Eve. Qantas deployed spare aircraft to transport passengers to their intended Melbourne destination.
